cab.content: Military Secret.31163Jwn Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,lSth November 1919.(Repeated Tehran under No. 77977.)(Received 18th.)17th November. Malleson telegraphs 15th November : " Merv, 6th November." 1. On 5th November 400 Bolshevik troops from Tashkeucl arrived at Mervbringing Merv garrison up to about 1,400 men." 2. There are now about 300 Afghan troops in Merv, but it is said more are coming."0"
